title: openid4vci proof
description: The paylod of a proof JWT used for requesting a Verifiable Credential bounded to the public key specified within the JWK header of this JWT. Client sends the request for issuing a Verifiable Credential to the credential endpoint of the credential issuer and includes the proof JWT

iss.description: The Issuer of the JWT; it MUST be set to the client_id of the Wallet Instance

iat.description: The UNIX Timestamp at which the JWT was issued; can be used to determine age of the JWT

aud.description: An URI value that identifies the recipient that the JWT is intended for; it MUST be set to the URI of the Credential Endpoint of the PID/EAA Provider

nonce.description: It MUST be set to the same value of the 'c_nonce' parameter in the Token Request provided by the Token Endpoint of the PID/EAA Issuer
